features.feature: Copy latest rate aggregate during quote state transitions using copyLatestRateAggregate strategy

Latest rate aggregate is defined based on 'isSingleRateType' value. When 'isSingleRateType' = True then search for the latest Rate Aggregate for the Quote should be done by 'updatedOn' attribute.

features.feature: Asynchronously copy all rate aggregates during quote version creation
